title: What are some music skills to pick up while in quarantine? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cultivate listening skill to the highest level. Seek advice of experts on care of the ears.Investigate why musicians tend to grow long hair and beards. Also try and make sense of why many top male singers and MUSIC DIRECTORS TEND TO HAVE female-like voice and non-muscular bodies. Is Music and other soft arts like painting and sculpture feminine trait? If you are not yet into fusion music, investigate why top musicians,after reaching the Zenith tend to practice and promote Fusion Music.
